reviewText: The Regular Show is the best current show on CN in my opinion. I was really happy with the selected episodes for this pack. It's the first release to contain Mordecai and C.J episodes, which are really enjoyable. I own the Rigby pack as well, and I honestly enjoy the episodes from this pack a bit more. All 16 episodes from this pack are some of the best from the whole series. The show has been really slow with season releases, but this pack is a great buy for the time being.

Regular Show needs proper releases already and less dvd compilations. Adventure Time, which debuted at the same time in 2010, has had four season releases both in dvd and bluray format. Regular show has had a simultaneous bluray/dvd release (containing seasons 1 and 2) and one dvd release with season 3 (no bluray version). With season 6 already started, I begin to wonder when we will get seasons 4 and 5. I am also curious if we will even get a high def release. These dvd releases are redundant, low effort, and are hardly of any value. Hold out for full season set. I know I will be.

This DVD contains 16 episodes from the Regular Show cartoon. Amazon doesn't always do a good job on their DVD episode listings so here are the episodes that are included on this DVD:

1. Bet to Be Blonde
2. Country Club
3. Paint Job
4. Guy's Night
5. Caveman
6. Every Meat Burritos
7. Real Date
8. Saving Time
9. New Year's Kiss
10. Laundry Woes
11. Dodge This
12. Portable Toilet
13. Play Date
14. Tants
15. Bad Portrait
16. Maxin' and Relaxin'
regular show is always going to be awesome no matter what
This is very enjoyable to watch.
Took a month and seven days to get here. My nine year old was super disappointed on the wait time.
My son love the dvd. It's one of his favorite shows!

Im 19 and love this show it helps recap a lot miss things in the seasons. I don't have cable cause the base doesn't give it to us so any chance I get I buy these DVDs

each episope is a personal favorate of mine. plus, the episode selection is large and will keep you entertained for hours. the cover is pretty cool too. cartoon network could not have made a better regular show dvd.
Love every dvd we have so far.  Love that I can watch it with my 2 boys.  Great show!
